Class unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • unit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DaemonPrince, DireAvengers, EldarGuardianDefenders, EldarRangers, SpaceMarine

    public abstract class unit
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all representations for a single infantry unit in warhammer 40K

      • resolveCloseCombat

        public void resolveCloseCombat(turnManager tM,
                               javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
        Figures out what to call and loops until one or both units die.
        Parameters:
        tM: - the current turn manager.
        root: - the game Pane so units can properly disappear when killed.

      • attackResolveNoOrder

        public void attackResolveNoOrder(turnManager tM,
                                 unit first,
                                 unit second,
                                 javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
        resolves combat for both combatants in two separate loops while not checking if the unit "second" has died or not For use with close combat when both units has equal initiate.
        Parameters:
        tM: - turn manager current in use by Window
        first: - a unit
        second: - a unit
        root: - current Pane of window.

      • attackResolveInOrder

        public void attackResolveInOrder(turnManager tM,
                                 unit first,
                                 unit second,
                                 javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
        Resolves combat for two units in order of their 'I' stat.
        Parameters:
        first: - unit with higher I attribute.
        second:unit - with lower I attribute.
        root: - the pane being used in the window class.
        tM: - turn manager currently in use by Window

      • shoot

        public void shoot(turnManager tM,
                  int Distance,
                  D6 d6,
                  Tables t,
                  javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
        Processes a shooting attack and randomizes outcome.
        Parameters:
        tM: - current Turn manager.
        Distance: - the distance inbetween the units in pixels rounded to nearest whole.
        d6: - an instance of the D6 class
        t: - an instance of the tables class
        root: - Current Pane being used in window.

      • charge

        public void charge(turnManager tM,
                   int distance,
                   javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
        Sets up a charge and executes overwatch if the charge is possible.
        Parameters:
        tM: - the turnManager being used in window
        distance: - distance between the two units
        root: - the pane from window

      • die

        public void die(javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
        Used whenever a unit dies. it removes the unit from play and makes it possible to win.
        Parameters:
        root: - the pane used in window. removes unit from play.

      • handleMouseClick

        public void handleMouseClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e,
                             turnManager tM,
                             javafx.scene.shape.Circle movementAssist,
                             javafx.scene.layout.Pane root,
                             javafx.scene.shape.Line targetingAssist)
        Used to handle a mouse click in a game. Action changes based off of turn and phase.
        Parameters:
        e: - the mouse event.
        tM: - the turn manager used in window
        movementAssist: - A circle used in window to assist with movement
        root: - the pane used in window
        targetingAssist: - A line that us used to help figure distance between units This method handles all possible events for a mouse clicked action including movement, shooting, and assualt.
